snippet: Investigations into racism at Sigma Alpha Epsilon fraternity chapters have extended to the University of Texas at Austin and Louisiana Tech in Ruston, though no new allegations had been substantiated.
lead_paragraph: Investigations into racism at Sigma Alpha Epsilon fraternity chapters have extended to the University of Texas at Austin and Louisiana Tech in Ruston, though no new allegations had been substantiated.

headline.main: Oklahoma: Fraternity Inquiry Extends to Campuses in Texas and Louisiana
headline.print_headline: Oklahoma: Fraternity Inquiry Extends To Campuses In Texas and Louisiana
